name: Vagabond
description: Vagabond is a historical manga series written and illustrated by Takehiko Inoue. It is based on the novel Musashi by Eiji Yoshikawa, which follows the life and journey of legendary swordsman Miyamoto Musashi. Set in feudal Japan, the manga explores Musashi's personal growth, his pursuit of martial arts mastery, and his encounters with various adversaries. Vagabond is known for its stunning artwork and intense action sequences, making it a must-read for fans of historical and martial arts stories.
author: Takehiko Inoue
